subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Shanghai Bobby, last season’s 2-year-old champion, made a successful comeback from a pelvic fracture, winning the Aljamin Stakes by a neck at Belmont Park as the 3-5 favorite.
snippet: Shanghai Bobby, last season’s 2-year-old champion, made a successful comeback from a pelvic fracture, winning the Aljamin Stakes by a neck at Belmont Park as the 3-5 favorite.
